description: Try our easy to follow Garden Bunny Cupcakes recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Cupcake,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Garden Bunny Cupcakes Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oven to 350°F (325°F for dark or non-stick pans). Place paper baking cup in each of 24 regular-size muffin cups. Make and bake cake mix as directed on box for cupcakes, using 180ml water, oil and eggs.
Cool 10 minutes; remove from pans to cooling racks. Cool completely.

Once the cupcakes have been cooled. Place Vanilla Buttercream Icing into a piping bag and frost the top of your cupcakes. If you do not have a piping bag, spread the icing evenly around the top of your cupcakes in a smooth dome.
Turn the frosted cupcakes upside down and dip them into coconut flakes to give your bunnies nice fluffy fur.
Snip a marshmallow in half diagonally and dip them into pink glitter sugar/pink sprinkles to make the ears. Use some extra icing to stick the ears into the top of your cupcakes.
Place a pink jellybean in the centre of the cupcake for its nose, and you’re done!
